starters.description: McDonald's World Famous Fries® are made with premium potatoes such as the Russet Burbank and the Shepody.
Rich and tasty gravy? Melty, mouth-watering cheese curds? On our World Famous Fries? You better believe it!

mains.description: The comforting taste of the juicy and delicious 100% Canadian beef burger, topped with tangy pickles, ketchup, mustard and the sweet bite of onion, all on a freshly toasted bun. Just like you remember.
Breaded seasoned chicken and crisp lettuce, topped with our Mayo-Style Sauce. Some ingredients are just meant to be together.
No artificial flavours, colours or preservatives. Made with 100% seasoned chicken breast, the Chicken McNuggets you crave are still simply delicious.

desserts.description: Part brownie. Part cookie. All delicious. Enjoy a decadent brownie cookie that’s soft on the inside, crunchy on the outside, and delicious all around.
A crisp and delicious snack, prepared for fruit lovers on the go.

A perfect companion to coffee; a quick-and-easy mid-morning or afternoon treat. With a choice of five delectable flavours including Banana Chocolate Chunk, Blueberry, Carrot, Fruit ‘n Fibre and Cranberry Orange. Enjoy one today!
